statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ -9 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 12 \\ 4 \\ -8 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
